SVGAttributeTransform-origin.summary: The transform-origin SVG attribute sets the origin for an item's transformations.

remarks.para: You can use this attribute with any SVG element.

blockquote.para: Note: As a presentation attribute in SVG, transform-origin corresponds in syntax and behavior to the transform-origin property in CSS, and can be used as CSS property to style SVG. See the CSS transform-origin property for more information.
